alert.note: Alert for Clark; Fayette; Jessamine (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 7:59PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Clark, northeastern Jessamine and southeastern Fayette Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 759 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Veterans Park, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Fayette, northeastern Jessamine and west central Clark Counties in east central Kentucky, including the following locations... Hootentown, Chilesburg, Coletown, Pine Grove, Athens and Locust Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
